website_summaries.verdict: An easily transportable generator at an affordable price that will power the essentials.
pros: Can be connected to another generator for extra power
Runs up to 10 hours on a single tank of fuel
Designed for safety with low-oil auto-off sensor
Can monitor power output with the voltmeter
cons: Won't provide backup power to major home appliances like stoves, ACs, and more

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver after Hurricane Maria in PR
customer_reviews.text: My family and Puerto Rico ordered this generator and it has been a lifesaver! My stepdad was able to connect the generator to the main electricity box of the house and thanks to this they are able to have a refrigerator connected, a couple of lights and fans for a few hours per night. So far it has been a great generator, cost efficient and reliable after two months of constant use every night. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Glory Gonzalez-Alamo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Champion generator, this being the smaller of the two. After the break in period, I changed the oil and put in a Royal Purple oil. It runs smooth and is as quite as many of the inverter generators at 58-59db at twenty three feet. I put a meter on it and the voltage is dead on at 60 cycles. I will buy a Champion again but that may be many years in the future. This small one can run a 5k -7kbtu window A/C. I just checked the sound in my camper with Windows open at about 50 feet and I got a reading of 36db. That is very quiet!!
customer_reviews.author: "Ranger"

customer_reviews.title: Died after using twice
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of junk. Worked great once. I used it once last year and it ran fine for a day. Although it is a bit louder than i expected. Just had a power outage and i’m writing this in the dark on my phone because the piece of junk won’t even start. Doesn’t even attempt to try and start - it’s like the on/off switch isn’t working or something or some safety shut off switch quit working. Nothing like a piece of vital equipment not working when you need it most. I have a Honda lawn mower that has been running strong and starts on the first crank after 13 years.... my next generator will be a Honda...
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Engine works, produces no electricity
customer_reviews.text: We set this generator up according to instructions and, though, the engine runs just fine, it generates no electricity. We contacted Champion, which was zero help in fixing our problem. We will now have to drain the gas and oil and take it to a repair shop that deals with Champion products, or go through the hassle of packing it up and returning it. What a disappointment, especially with Champion's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight generator for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this generator for a couple of years now and I would highly recommend it to anyone who's looking for a lightweight gene for camping or for the garage when you don't have an outlet handy. I've run countless hours on this with minimal maintenance, and it starts and runs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Grinzy

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this generator
customer_reviews.text: The generator ran for about an hour the first time I used it. Then the next time I used it would only run for about a minute and then automatically shut off and kept doing That. Everything seemed normal, there was plenty of gas, the gas switch was on, oil was full, so there was no reason it would not run. I was very frustrated to learn that this product could not be returned but Amazon to the rescue! I received a full refund and told no need to return the generator.
customer_reviews.author: brett bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first two times that I ran it, but on the third occasion it wouldn’t crank and the fuel tank has started leaking fuel. Not very happy at all with this purchase will be trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: 5 years and still going
customer_reviews.text: We have used this generator for 5 years now and it is still going strong. A great small generator for the money. We use it during outages to run the refrigerator, a few lamps, internet, computers and to recharge our phones. I top off the gas tank before bed and sleep for 8 hours with no worries. It generally runs for another hour or so after I get up before I have to refill the gas tank. I highly recommend this generator for light duty needs.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Hurricane Florence, because when hurricane Mathew came through the year before we were out of power for days. Power did indeed go out and I fired this up, and it worked perfectly for 5 days running 24 hours a day until our power was restored. It would last about 10 hours before I had to refill the gas, and In my opinion wasn't even that loud, you could barely hear it inside the house. I highly recommend this great gen.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell with the one i got
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, easy pull start, mine did come with about 2 oz,s of slightly dirty oil , so i dont know what thats about, cant say i was to happy about seeing that since its suppose to come with no oil. Hope it aint a refurbished model
customer_reviews.author: Hollerdog

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this generator as back up to batteries and diesel generator in our off grid farmstead. I have been running it daily, for a few hours each time. It's fuel consumption is minimal, and it starts every time without hesitation. I only use non ethanol gas as suggested, and full synthetic oil. I would put hours at roughly 10-12 hours per gallon at more than a half load. Another great thing about this product is that it is light and easy to move! I plan to purchase another one to run our green house during winter. You cannot beat the value and durability of this product. **update- 3 years later, still running strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Off-grid momma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I watched a video that introduced me to the product and the woman was using it to charge up her battery bank. Like myself she is using solar and she found out that this generator complimented her system. I purchase the generator and like the metal parts, construction, overall quality. It is light enough for me to transport myself too. I am planning on constructing a vented box for it which will keep it from vibrating, reduce the noise and keep it from the elements of weather.
customer_reviews.author: ElizLovesArt

customer_reviews.title: Aqesome value!!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, smaller than most good generators, noise level gets low at about 0-15 feet, not easy to turn on when cold of course but waaaaayyyyy simple to operate, everything is properly labeled, and best of all the instruction manual clear and simple, it even brings wiring diagram!!
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but not inverter quiet. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this generator for our pop up camper when camping off grid. Generator runs flawlessly. I've got about 40 hours on mine and dont really have any complaints except it's a little louder than I would like but then again it's not an inverter generator. I put the generator about 50 feet into the woods behind my campsite and could barely hear it. For the price you cant beat the quality and mobility of the champion 1200/1500. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for smaller needs
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and run. Bought 2 Champions after Harvey and glad I did. Use this one for smaller needs like power tools or camping. Use the larger 3500 for refrigerators, etc.. For longer storage just remember to add a little fuel saver, then run the generator and turn off the fuel valve to it runs dry. This saves your fuel line, carburetor, etc... from gumming up.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonTexansfan

customer_reviews.title: A lot of Little Things to Do and Watch Oil
customer_reviews.text: Certainly does the trick and keeps our fridge going (make sure the wattage is good for your needs), there's just a lot of things to manage with it. Sensitive to oil level(for a good reason) so if it isn't starting, you may need to add a bit of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as one would think
customer_reviews.text: Does not run to much at once got to pick what to run. Power went out and was able to keep the fridge and a light it two. Running.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Of course it’s not as quiet as an inverter, but it’s a lot less money and quieter than I had feared. Seems to work very well, easy to start, nicely designed controls. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Silberman

customer_reviews.title: Runs good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had it since late October and use it frequently. The only drawback is that it does smoke a little on startup. I have had to add oil (because of the auto oil shutdown) twice so far; although not much. other than that I think it is a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nevins

customer_reviews.title: It stops working after 10 sec running
customer_reviews.text: Starts and stops within 10 seconds. Very noisy but it stops soon enough. Will not buy again. Still trying to get it repaired. Brand new and it never worked once
customer_reviews.author: nopublicnameforme

customer_reviews.title: Sips gas. Enough to run a fridge and a deep freezer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this its first real workout today after a big wind storm. Only needed to run it for about six hours, but noticed that after keeping a refrigerator and chest freezer running all that time, very little gas was gone. Before needing it in this instance, I had tested it every season and thought it was a little on the loud side. However after plugging it in today and putting it in the back yard with extension cords coming through the window, I couldn’t even hear it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Meko

customer_reviews.title: Happy With It.
customer_reviews.text: Near perfect for my needs. Light enough for easy one-man portability. Easy start. Produces enough power to easily run a 1/3hp pump. Seems to sip fuel rather that gulp it. Fit and finish good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: Great flawless generator no worries whats so ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this generator Thursday the 14th got the five hour break in period done in one day the length of time is five hours running drained the old oil and put new oil in it today runs great!!!!! I ran my small 1/3 air compressor as a test handled it like a champ i would recommend not putting a load on it for the first five hours just to be safe i gargantuantuee i wont have any problems with this generator great by
customer_reviews.author: Will haurin

customer_reviews.title: Will not run
customer_reviews.text: The generator will start and will run for 10 seconds with no load. Adjusting the throttle helped little, but still stops after a minute. Not eligible for return. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay running
customer_reviews.text: Wont stay running. Starts easily. I will return it. Cant use it if it wont stay running. I Iive off grid. This was bought to replace another brand that would not start at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickhick

customer_reviews.title: this generator is awesome on fuel consumption and does not weigh too much
customer_reviews.text: This generator really kicks out some power- rated at 10 amps it has ran my 12 amp yard vac and has never blown the breaker not once. i have also used it to run multiple items at one time such as lights battery chargers and computers all at the same time. this generator is awesome on fuel consumption and does not weigh too much, its quiet almost as quiet as a honda and it doesnt BOG DOWN as some gens do. hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: frank bishop

customer_reviews.title: Champion saved our office in the jungle.
customer_reviews.text: Took this guy to central Africa. No electrical power in the area. We have solar power but the printers were too sensitive to frequency. Champion saved our office in the jungle. This generator is also easy to pull start.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Berryman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE GENERATOR. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Had it over a year now. Always starts without a problem. Hadn't started it in months, started right up like a charm just the other day. All the people that write bad reviews on this don't know what they're doing-- either can't do the math of how much power they need or don't follow the instructions. This runs like a CHAMPION.
customer_reviews.author: Outer Banx

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend purchasing this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little generator. I've put around 1300 hours on it in the last three months as it's my backup to my solar system that powers my whole house and it's still running strong. It starts easily, had less issues in extreme cold (-27F) than a much more expensive Honda, and is extremely efficient. For photos, and many more details, see my post devoted to this little powerhouse. I would and plan to buy it again as soon as I wear this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Fy Nyth

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Since the beginning I have had nothing but trouble with this product! Won't start, won't stay running, amazingly long wait times on hold with champion. They've sent replacement spark plugs would start after multiple cranks but won't start again a week later. I bought this to back up A sump pump and if it won't start it does me absolutely no good.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: You cannot return this item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take with me on camping trips. Went through multiple people looking at it, going through the instruction manual... could not get it to start. Maybe I bought a dud but best of luck to anyone else who tries this generator.
customer_reviews.author: William madoch

customer_reviews.title: Very handy power source.
customer_reviews.text: Runs everything on my trailer except the AC. Easy start. Lasts for hours. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: A good little generator!
customer_reviews.text: Good little generator and the perfect size for our needs (emergency power after a storm). It's small enough that I can pick it up and carry it, but puts out enough power to keep the refrigerator and a few other things running. (It probably could have put more load on it, but I wasn't sure how many watts our big fridge pulled and I didn't want to overload it.) If I could have asked for any improvement, it would be a better fuel level indicator. It's supposed to have a 1.45 gallon tank, but it looks full with only 1/2 gallon and the manual warns against over-filling the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: During electrical outages, I was able to have lights, TV and internet. Was also able to keep my devices charged. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a little generator
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a little generator. This is for emergencies. Well worth $150 in case of long-term power outages where products in the fridge or freezer, worth many times more than the generator cost, could go bad. Heavy, simple, but it'll work.
customer_reviews.author: brewmaistro

customer_reviews.title: great Lil one!
customer_reviews.text: Good Genny does what it was ment to do! Power stuff up without any issues. Love the fact its small and portable! Its quieter then most gennys but again its not quite like a Honda. If maintained right you will have lots of quality hours on this one! It will power up coffee maker...TV...some space heaters... Small stuff maybe a 1200 watt microwave... Just stay within its specs and you will be fine. Make sure u run the Genny till starvation before u store it at anytime!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BlackBeard

customer_reviews.title: Champion Power Equipment 42436
customer_reviews.text: Pulled and checked plug adjusted gap. loaded with oil and gas started as directed by quick start guide and bang second pulled started this baby up, buffed my car which took about 3 hours, three steps swirl removal, wax and sealed, also polished all glass and sealed. To stop, cut off fuel and let it starve itself did not add fuel stabilizer as it not going to sit around to next year. Power never surged or faltered. smooth delivery easy hook up. all in all a very good purchase at 200 dollars. Oh, very well built quality construction. I only wish it was 150 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 days and now won't start. I called the manufacturer SND spent hours on the phone and it still doesn't start
customer_reviews.author: Phil W McDonald II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for motorcycle tire warmers.
customer_reviews.text: We use this generator on our tire warmers on race day and practice. Always starts on the second or third pull, even after sitting for a couple weeks at a time. Noise level is bearable, not loud enough to annoy anyone. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I bout it due to its size and weight. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bout it due to its size and weight. I was able to ship it to PR using the US Postal Service.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It's very quiet for the size I was very impressed with that as I was a major concern because of where I use it I was worried about the neighbors complaining about the noise but I highly recommend this it's a great value and great investment!
customer_reviews.author: kym

customer_reviews.title: YuSmall. Compact. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact, easy to store and to carry. Somewhat quiet. Enough power (barely) to run fridge after hurricane. It performed as
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results, Performed Well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this generator to use for camping. After I put oil and gas into it, it took 3 or 4 pulls and it was running. I used about a week after that camping at Michigan Speedway. With each start, it took no more than 2 pulls to fire it up. It runs very quiet and is also very light. One person can easily pick it up and carry it. We used it to power a coffee maker, a radio and some lights. Couldn't have asked it to perform better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, no regrets
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult deciding to buy this inexpensive generator. I don't mind spending money on useful things but monies to tight to toss it away. Very glad I did. Works like a "champ" and very quiet. Not too large, not ultra heavy. Starts up at 6400' in elevation quickly and runs smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Average-Joe

customer_reviews.title: The generator started fine. The instructions are very good
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit heavy for one person to carry but it is not impossible. The generator started fine. The instructions are very good. However, this should be out in the open. I was testing it in my open garage, and it got very smelly of carbon monoxide very quick. The noise level is average....what I would expect; not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Good generator.
customer_reviews.text: Good to have for camping and such. Also handy when power goes out for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Putney

customer_reviews.title: decent generator for the price
customer_reviews.text: overall i am pleased with this generator. i have used it four different times now and it started on the second or third pull each time. its not as quiet as some of the more expensive generators but its not overly noisey , the only issue i have had is the pull cord broke the third time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: acox

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me! runs my camper frig, microwave and charges up my 12v battery for lights and water pump. i have a little over one hundred hours on it so it is time for a oil change. going to put 1/2 qt of oil in it instead of .4 qt. it took a good downpour and kept going. expect many years of use. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: james s.

customer_reviews.title: I like this unit very well
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit very well. It's easy to start runs good. The only bad thing is it's louder than the Honda I had before. It was stolen and it's very expensive to buy another. It's light enough lift into my pickup bed so I will use it and like.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: The built-in volt meter shows a perfect 115V. Nice little generator for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I added 5W-30 full synthetic oil, added gas, adjusted the choke, and it started on the first pull. The built-in volt meter shows a perfect 115V. Nice little generator for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing small generator.
customer_reviews.text: This is a working horse. It runs and runs. Just do the maintenance and thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Great generator
customer_reviews.text: This generator started on the first pole and is very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Power when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for camping or when don't have electrical outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size if you are looking for something smaller
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really liking the generator. Nice size if you are looking for something smaller. fit and finish is really nice. Instructions are very user friendly and easy to understand. Great price and light weight. Received my in 2 days Thank you Amazon Prime. I have only ran it once so far but it started right up and is going to be a nice little back up generator for my home. Pretty quite to for a portable generator.
customer_reviews.author: David Oslinker

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This generator worked great the first time I used it. It had to be restarted once the second time I used it. It would not start the third time I tried to use it. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Nakata

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can depend on this for emergencies so don’t have to use often but glad overall
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Handy and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for my use, running power tools away from an electricity source.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, but I'll always be envious of the quieter Hondas.
customer_reviews.author: Alex McCool

customer_reviews.title: This generator is perfect for my investment property
customer_reviews.text: This generator is perfect for my investment property. I see this tool as helping me to complete the this renovation. A generator is essential for a distressed property. This little Champion was economical and adequately ran my power tools. I see it as being valuable in future projects and a great little backup if there is a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Will shut down after 10 minutes when under 40% load
customer_reviews.text: First 40 hours of use were great. Now, two weeks after purchasing, this unit has problems. Will shut down after about 10 minutes when under 40% load. That is my main complaint. The claim that this unit will run for 10 hours under 50% load is a joke. My experience is that it will last about 7 hours under those conditions. Thus far customer service has not been helpful. Amazon does not allow returns on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Smith

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead shut off my electricity!
customer_reviews.text: Save a lot of money. Started on the first pull.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bower

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality works fine
customer_reviews.text: For a low output application it works fine. Refrigerator, TV and even charging an electric car on the 110 charger although not all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid little generator. I've got 80 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid little generator. I've got 80 hours on it so far. I use it to power my off the grid home in the evenings: it charges the battery while keeping 6 or 8 LED lights and a TV going. I run it about 4 hours and it uses approx. half a gallon of gas. Not all that quiet but it didn't cost enough to be quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Compact and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and works very well. This generator runs everything in my trailer except the AC and is small to easily carry when setting it out to use.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Angus

customer_reviews.title: Good protable generator
customer_reviews.text: So far love it. Replaced a almost new 2cycle that just quite putting out voltage (red one sold by Amazon). This one has been very reliable so far. Have used several times and starts easily and a little quiter that the 2 cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Great, except all the gas everywhere....
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars only because apparently they tested the unit at the factory, which is not a bad thing BUT they failed to re-drain the fluids out of it. So of course when it was delivered. It was upside down and when I opened the box the entire machine, manual, packaging was covered in Petroleum. I let it sit upright for a day just to make sure anything else still inside ran back down to where it is suppose to be, hopefully I don't lose a seal in the motor because of it. But after 2 days I was bold enough to actually try and start it and it ran so..... so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got it to work for three months with out break. I live in PR and since Maria hurricane we have no power. It only power a fridge, tv and couple of fans but is enough. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Ariana M

customer_reviews.title: Great for self contained mobile musicians!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my mobile production studios for live applications. This thing is great! 5 stars! I would recommend this to anybody. I run an iPad 3, iPad Air in an Alesis io dock 2 and a Novation Impulse 49 keyboard controller all going into a Fender Event PA system. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've actually only started it up a couple times since buying it. It was a breeze to start. Only took a couple pulls, and it's easy pulling. It ran my shop vac with no problem at all. It's quieter than most other generators I've used. So far, I'm liking it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected! Heavier than I thought, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected! Heavier than I thought, but no problem for the men-folk :)
customer_reviews.author: GoPackGo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little generator
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made generator. Little generator with big features.
customer_reviews.author: T5club

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, perfect condition. Added oil, pressed the run button, set the choke. 2 easy pulls, started right up, and ran wonderful. I start it every few weeks, and always starts on the second pull. Great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: Simple, small generator at a good price, easy to start, not too heavy, kind'a quiet, powers all of my electric yard tools and recharges my RV batteries and powers all of the RV accessories except the AC. Performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rocinante

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for a small camp trailer and emergency back up for fridge and freezer during power outages. Works awesome and is much easier to transport and store than the super size ones.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: ... and for emergency situations this one fit's the bill nicely. it's easy to set up and start using
customer_reviews.text: needed an alternative power supply source for out door activities and for emergency situations this one fit's the bill nicely. it's easy to set up and start using. take few minutes. and ur up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan calhoun

customer_reviews.title: ... it for well over a year and it works great. Never let us down and for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had it for well over a year and it works great. Never let us down and for the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep fridge and a few lights going. Great for job sites.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little generator will get you by. Has only one plug which is 110
customer_reviews.author: Kevin myers

customer_reviews.title: Very good generator for $200
customer_reviews.text: Very good generator for $200. The engines runs very smooth and always starts immediately. Using it for power tools and charging batteries and I have been quite pleased with how easy and sturdy it's been.
customer_reviews.author: Nic A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We love it.We had a winter storm & was afraid power would go out is reason we purchased it.But didn't have it but my husband got him a storage building & hasn't got power connected to it yet so he is using it & it works great for his uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good generator for camping
customer_reviews.text: great generator so far bought for camping.no problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: macloicy

customer_reviews.title: USED IT FOR ABOUT HALF HOUR BEFORE IT BROKE
customer_reviews.text: USED IT FOR ABOUT HALF HOUR BEFORE IT BROKE ON OUR CAMPING TRIP
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mancilla

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Good generator. Quiet and small and somewhat light. Only thing I dislike is there is only 1 plug but that's acceptable for a 1200 watt
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Fired on first pull. String is a bit weak and coming apart. But all in all, not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Obitts

customer_reviews.title: Good little generator.
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need camping, power outages, construction. Runs pretty quiet. Great price. Good gas usage 10 hrs running at 1200w.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Super low noise generator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this generator for my home. I do murals as well and carrier this bad boy everywhere. It's low noise and works really fast and smooth. I recommend this item to anyone who requires a powerful and yet low noise generator for a great price. It takes little effort to start and the weight it's perfect for any men to carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a backup in case of an emergency, mainly to run the refrigerator and a few lights. Read the reviews and decided to fine this a try. Got it from Amazon in three days, read the directions and fired it up. Started fine on the second pull, hooked up a circular saw and a few other items with no problems. Hope I don't have to use it much, but feel better now that I have one and for $200, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good to have on hand, use this one a lot
customer_reviews.author: jcysr

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for what I paid...powers my remote building for lighting and minor equipment when I need it. I take it along to charge my travel trailer too. Light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND QUIET
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT FOR MY RV WHEN OUT CAMPING. I THOUGHT IT WAS GOING TO BE TO LOUD BUT ITS JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small tasks
customer_reviews.text: Great little generator. Ran three fans for about 8 hours on a full tank of gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: LM in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Generator
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping great little generator perfect for running tv's ,lights , etc during power outages this is our second one we liked the first one so much bought a back up for the back up :-)
customer_reviews.author: lisa bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Good little generator
customer_reviews.text: Good little generator. Perfect for camping and inflating air mattresses and larger beach toys. Not too heavy and very easy to start. Has enough juice for the average Joe and isn't that noisy for an inexpensive unit. Can't go wrong for the price. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Holland

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: It starts and runs well.. It seems really dependable .. like it a lot so far
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jones

customer_reviews.title: What a great little unit
customer_reviews.text: What a great little unit. It's small, but does the job it was meant to do. Not too loud, but not as quiet as an inverted. For the $159.99, you can't get a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Everything they said it was and more
customer_reviews.text: Excellant price with great feature such as gas gauge. Came from $700 generator which was a problem to,operate. This one starts with first pull and runs smooth and strong.
customer_reviews.author: B. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little Genny
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little Genny !!!! Starts easy, even in cold weather & runs for hours without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: DAKOTA

customer_reviews.title: High recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unite last Nov. It saved my butt last night in the very cold winter night when teh power was out. It was very easy to pull out from teh box and add 10W30, and gas and we we go. It was very quite and runs great for my sump and Fridge. Fortunately, I only need it for a few hours. It is a peace of mind to have this one handy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mouyangren

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and great price! this is a nice compact generator and ...
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping and great price! this is a nice compact generator and works perfectly ! very quiet too! we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price range - quiet and does a great job !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Palmer

product_meta.title: Champion Power Equipment 42436 Original Model 1500/1200-Watt Portable Generator, Yellow/Black
feature_bullets: Designed for Safety – Includes a low-oil shut-off sensor and has a 0.6-quart oil capacity (recommended 10W-30). Frequency : 60 Hertz
Dependable – At 1500 starting watts and 1200 running watts, enjoy up to 10 hours of run time on a full tank of gasoline with a noise level of 65 dBA from 23 feet
Multi-Purpose – Includes a 120V 20A household outlet, and provides “just enough” power for RV-use, camping, tailgating, boating, weekend trips, family vacations and small jobs around the house
Voltmeter – Easily monitor power output at a glance. No automatic voltage regulation
Champion Support – Includes 3-year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support from dedicated experts
